abstract: A spokeswoman for the French company did not answer questions about the its editing practices.
lead_paragraph: A French publishing company said Tuesday that it “bitterly regrets” allowing one of its history books to state that the C.I.A. orchestrated the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks and that the misinformation echoed conspiracy theories “devoid of any factual basis.”
keywords: History of the 20th Century in Cards (Book)
